articles.content: Actor, dialogue writer and occasional director Vijay Mauryas Mast Mein Rehne Ka is a cheerfully meandering tale of two couples thrown together by circumstance. Kamat (Jackie Shroff) is so lonely that… [+2213 chars]

articles.description: In the upcoming episode of Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Abhira turns support system for Armaan, will the two grow closer?
articles.content: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai has been witnessing high-voltage drama in their upcoming episodes. But, it seems as if the audience is not impressed with the current storyline and plot. The makers decided… [+1919 chars]
